subject: Re: Customised KGTMS Fundraiser Page
preview: Hey Rica  This is great! Thanks so much for your help with this 😊

full_threads.body:
Hey Rica

This is great! Thanks so much for your help with this 😊

Hi Shannen,

Sure, all good now on this one. 
https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/donation-to-sarah-and-john-wedding/
@joel could you please check this? I changed the field's label yesterday, not sure what happened. Thanks!

Hi Joel

Thanks for that.

When I click on the 'other' donation amount, nothing pops up to input my new donation amount - can you please look into this?

Thanks

Shannen

Hi Shannen, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/donation-to-sarah-and-john-wedding/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Joel Apologies for the delay in getting back to you. Just a few things:
  • Can you please update the donation amount that says 'A little bit more' to 'Other'.
  • Add the below blurb above 'select your donation amount'
"Our mission is to accelerate Australian MS research toward the prevention, better treatments and a cure for MS. Every year we fund innovative research of the highest calibre from Australia's best and brightest. We bring a diverse group of minds to focus on solving MS: from neurologists, stem cell biologists, immunologists, epidemiologists, through to imaging experts; our community of dedicated researchers are working towards our common vision to see a world without MS." Thanks so much Shannen

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Shannen,

Confirming we have updated the page. 
https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/donation-to-sarah-and-john-wedding/

Hi Heath Amazing, thank you so much for putting this together. Just a few thoughts below:
  • Can you please hide the top nav on the landing page? It would be good for it to just show the KGTMS logo to avoid anyone getting distracted or navigating away from the donations page
  • Can you please change the dollar handles to $50/$100/$150/Other
Once done, I'll send it off to Sarah for review 😊 Thanks so much! Best Shannen

Hi Shannen, 

Ok great, please have a look at this form: 
https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/donation-to-sarah-and-john-wedding/

Let me know if you would like any tweaks?

Hi Shannen, 

We should be able to create this, can I confirm that this form should be created on kissgoodbyetoms.org?

Hey team



Just wanted to follow up on the below. Can you please let know as soon as possible.



Thank you

Shannen
kuya @joel, need help. can you check this. thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi team

Happy Friday!

We would like to set up a landing page for a fundraiser who would like to use it as a donation page. Below are the features required for the page:
  • Page to only be accessible if you have the link. Not available for public to see
  • Can the custom URL include 'Sarah and John Wedding' or something like that?
  • A donation form with the below fields:
    • First name
    • Last name
    • Mobile
    • Email address
    • Postal Address that also accepts PO boxes
    • Blank box for them to input their desired donation amount
    • Blank box for donors to input a message - could it say "A message to the newlyweds" above or within the box?
    • A tick box for donors to tick that says "I'm happy to share my details with Sarah and John"
  • Ability for us to run a report every week or so to provide to the fundraiser
  • Donations and tally to be hidden on the page and only able to view from the above report
  • Main header to read: On behalf of Sarah and John on their wedding day, thank you for supporting life-changing MS research

We'd love to have the base of this to be done by end of next week, so that we can then share it with the fundraiser to provide any edits/feedback on what she would like.

Can you please let me know if this can be done and if there's anything else you need from me?

Many thanks
Shannen

Shannen Chia
Senior Fundraising Coordinator, Events, Strategic Marketing & Fundraising
Multiple Sclerosis Ltd.
T 02 9646 0620
E shannen.chia@ms.org.au
W www.ms.org.au
